description:
1. Recognise the personality认清个性

Straight away, you have to be aware that with a cat, you're dealing with a strong personality. You have to work with it, rather than against it. Dogs you can call, get their attention and get them in a certain position. With a cat, don’t even try. The more you try with a cat, the more they won’t be a part of the shoot that day.你要立即意识到和猫相处，要面对的就是很强的个性。你得配合它，而不是和它对立。面对狗，你可以叫它、吸引它们的注意、让它们待在特定位置。面对猫，你想都不要想。你越试着摆弄猫，这一天它们就越不配合拍照。

You have to be more covert and under the radar. If they are exploring, explore with them. Get down to their level and even crawl on the floor. Occasionally, they will pause or do something and flash you a gaze. You have to be patient and ready to grab that moment.你要更加隐蔽，不要引起它们的注意。如果它们在探索，你就和它们一起探索。身子压得和它们一样低，甚至要匍匐在地面上。它们偶尔会停下来或做点什么，然后突然看你一眼。你要有耐心，准备好抓拍那一瞬间。

2. Don't force it不要强迫它

Don’t have the kind of shot you are looking for fixed in your mind. Sometimes you may be waiting for them to play or flick a ball with their paw, however that may not happen in the time you want. You may never get that shot. Be open to what they are showing you at the time.脑海中不要总想着要拍什么镜头，有时你在等它们玩球或用爪子推球，却不一定会在你希望的那个时刻发生。你可能永远也拍不到那个镜头，你要接受它们在那一刻所展现给你的。

3. Check your lighting检查光线

Lighting is important with cats. Cat’s eyes are fascinating, and their pupils can tell you a lot about their mood. Generally, the more fired up they are, the wider the pupils will be. The more relaxed and sleepy they are, the narrower they will be.给猫拍照光很重要。猫的眼睛很迷人，它们的瞳孔会让你看懂它们很多情绪。通常它们越活跃，瞳孔越大。它们越放松越困，瞳孔越窄。

Cats with slits in their eyes look distant and a bit cold, as if they aren’t in the room with you. Cats with wide pupils look a bit crazy. Usually something in the middle is right. It's a challenge, but it's a challenge you'll be rewarded for.瞳孔眯成一条缝时猫看起来不友好，有点冷淡，就好像它们没有跟你一起呆在屋子里似的。瞳孔大的猫看起来有点疯狂。通常瞳孔不宽不窄就正好了，这是一项挑战，但这个挑战会给你带来回报。

4. Get them after a nap睡醒后再拍

In terms of the best time of day, it's a bit of an experiment. If they are just starting to sleep, there isn’t much of a chance. But if they are coming out of a sleep, they are in the middle zone of being a little bit sleepy and little bit playful. After a cat’s sleep is a pretty good time to capture their attention. It comes back to working with them — don’t rush them and don’t force them.提到一天中最好的时间，就像是在做实验。如果它们刚开始睡觉，就没什么可能了。但如果它们从睡梦中醒来，恰好处于有点困又有点顽皮的中间状态。猫刚睡醒时就是你捕捉它们注意力很好的时候。要和他们配合了——不要催促它们也不要强迫它们。

5. Be on their level和它们高度一致

Don’t be scared to put yourself out there, provided the neighbours aren’t looking over the fence at the time. The more you roll around on the ground and make yourself interesting, the more likely it is they will look at you. Make little sounds, get down to their eye level and crawl around and do something that’s worthy of a look from them — then you might get the shot.不要害怕待在那儿，摆出一种互不侵犯的姿态。你越在地上滚、越表现得有趣，它们越有可能看你。少弄出声音，低到它们眼睛的高度，再到处爬，做些值得让它们赏你一眼的事情，你才有可能拍好。

title: 给喵星人拍照的5个技巧

description:
Everyday interactions such as striking up a conversation or taking part in one might not be a piece of cake when English is not your first language. Some people are scared of making mistakes, others don’t feel confident about speaking English because they feel clumsy and awkward. Why sometimes is it so difficult to speak fluently even though we know all the English grammar rules from A to Z?如果英语不是你的第一语言，那每天展开或参与一个英语对话对你而言就不是小菜一碟那么简单了。有些人担心犯错，有些人则因为英语讲的磕磕巴巴而羞于开口。为什么有的时候即使我们对语法已掌握的烂熟于心，但还是无法讲出一口流利的英语呢？

Could there be a place where you can express yourself just like you do in real life, but without worrying about the way you speak or the mistakes you make. That place is theatre.有没有一个地方能让你像实际生活中那样自由地表达自己，而不用担心自己说话的方式或犯错误。剧院就是这样一个地方。

The good news is that drama never stops helping us to explore life. Whether we want to work on our self-confidence, self-efficacy in public speaking or to learn a foreign language, drama is one of the best ways to achieve results. Why? Because playing enables us to overcome our rational and emotional barriers. Especially when we are supported by a facilitator and a group of like-minded people. We feel at ease and safe. Safe in the words we speak and the way we express ourselves.好的一点就是戏剧一直帮助我们探索生活。不管我们是想提高我们在公共演讲中的自我信心与自我效率还是想习得一门外语，戏剧都是取得这样效果的最佳途径之一。

This is the magic of drama and the reason why drama boosts the learning process. When drama meets the field of education, it can transform a traditional lesson into an exciting learning experience.这就是戏剧的魔力，也是戏剧能在你的学习过程中发挥作用的原因。当戏剧与教育相碰撞，戏剧能使一堂传统的课程变成一次相当有趣的学习经历。

Many learning methods were born from drama. The most important of them is called Process Drama and is about learning foreign languages through theatre.许多学习方法都是由戏剧而来。这当中最重要的是方法就是过程戏剧（常用于课堂的戏剧手法），也就是通过戏剧学习外语。

At the Fast Learning School we design and organise language courses based on Process Drama. Our participants learn English by acting, writing drama scripts and performing. They gain fluency and learn new words in a welcoming group lead by a professional teacher. The courses are 100% about learning English as a second language, but what is different in these classes is the way people achieve results: they play, improvise, act, sing and… yes, have lots of fun!在快速学习课堂，我们在过程戏剧的基础上，设计并组织相关的语言课程。我们的参与者通过表演以及编写剧本来学英语。在一名专业教师的带领下参与者在欢迎小组中学习新的词汇且英语说得流利起来。这些课程百分百是把英语当做第二语言来学，但不同的是参与者取得进步的方式：他们可以玩，他们临场组队，他们可以演，还可以唱…没错，就是这么欢乐！
